statements: SELECT * FROM multimedia_content;
SELECT id, media_url, media_type, user_id FROM multimedia_content;
SELECT user_id, media_url FROM multimedia_content WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM multimedia_content WHERE media_type = 'image';
SELECT id, user_id FROM multimedia_content WHERE media_url LIKE '%.png';
SELECT * FROM multimedia_content WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT id, media_type FROM multimedia_content WHERE media_type = 'image' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, media_url FROM multimedia_content WHERE media_type = 'video' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM multimedia_content WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND media_type = 'audio';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM multimedia_content WHERE media_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM multimedia_content;
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM multimedia_content ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profile WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT content_id, content_url FROM multimedia_content WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_profile ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM multimedia_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, content_type, content_url FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_type = 'image' ORDER BY content_id DESC;

SELECT content_id, content_type FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_type = 'video' ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_url, upload_date FROM Images WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM Images ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT gif_id, gif_url, upload_date FROM GIFs ORDER BY gif_id;
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM Images WHERE upload_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Videos ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT gif_id, gif_url, user_id FROM GIFs WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY gif_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM Images GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT gif_id, gif_data FROM gifs ORDER BY upload_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT video_id, upload_timestamp FROM videos WHERE video_data IS NOT NULL;

SELECT image_id, upload_timestamp FROM images WHERE upload_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
